entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 06:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning except a few flurries over higher terrain. Clearing this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
